thread.section_title: Hotel Kapok Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very disappointed
thread.title_full: Very disappointed - Review of Hotel Kapok Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: MAWPinn
title: Very disappointed
text: This was the second time I'd stayed at this hotel. The first was ok, but this time had made it never again. Booked the fashion room/suite with the big round bath and instead got a normal bath, but to top it all the water was barely warm! Had to go out for them to fix it. The room doesn't even have a full length mirror. Both are unacceptable. Then when I came to pay the bill they added on 15%. This is clearly how they suck you into booking. This hotel is no where near the four stars it claims to be. It's simply not worth the money.
